WHEN B.PAY_TYPE = 0 AND A.END_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN datediff( DAY, A.BEG_DATE, A.END_DATE ) WHEN B.PAY_TYPE = 0 AND A.END_DATE IS NULL THEN datediff( DAY, A.BEG_DATE, GETDATE ( ) ) WHEN B.PAY_TYPE = 1 THEN datediff( DAY, A.BEG_DATE, A.END_DATE ) ELSE datediff( DAY, A.BEG_DATE, GETDATE ( ) ) END AS days FROM PA_PAYSERVICE A where A.CHARGE_FLAG != 1 LEFT JOIN PAYSERVICE B ON A.PAYSERVICE_ID = B.PAYSERVICE_ID ) C GROUP BY C.ID_CARD ) PA on P.ID_CARD = PA.ID_CARD where P.HOSP_NUM = #{hospNum}
